title: Why does Riven get so much hate?
body:
Not saying she isn't a super strong champion, but in the elo I am in, I don't even see the players play her to her full potential.
IE: The Cancel Animations that she is allowed to do, wall junmping, flash plays.

I know I will get hate and get called a riven player, but just wondering why so much hate when these champs exists top lane {{champion:150}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:39}} 
I would rather deal with Riven then these champs.
